treatment-md.title: Zospeum isselianum Pollonera 1887
treatment-md.article-title: Groping through the black box of variability: An integrative taxonomic and nomenclatural re-evaluation of Zospeumisselianum Pollonera, 1887 and allied species using new imaging technology (Nano-CT, SEM), conchological, histological and molecular data (Ellobioidea, Carychiidae)
